Project done as a part of Digital Humanities course (UCLA):

- Researched and analyzed root causes of food insecurity in West Africa, integrating data on agricultural productivity, climate, and conflict

- Created interactive Tableau visualizations to communicate geographic and socioeconomic patterns in food access

- Designed and built the project website using WordPress, customizing layout and structure with HTML and CSS to enhance narrative flow and user experience

Presented findings through a public-facing digital narrative: foodsecurity.humspace.ucla.edu
